# Overview
This repository contains scripts used for data analysis in the *Type2-low Asthma Transcriptomics Project* study. These scripts were developed to process, analyze, and visualize the data used in the project. A separate repository hosts the supplementary tables associated with the study.

# Repositories
- **[Scripts](#)**: Contains R scripts used for data preprocessing, statistical analysis, and visualization.
- **[Supplementary_data](#)**: Includes supplementary tables with processed data and additional reference materials.
